patterns: may I know the classes offered?
may I know the tracks offered?
Are there any online classes available?
responses: We have classes/Track for Ai, Data Science, Web development and Mobile development

patterns: classes are available for beginner in Ai, artificial intelligence
where do I have to start learning for AI
how many AI courses offered in Simbolo
responses:
Available courses for AI track in Simbolo  
    1. Fundamentals of Python Programming Course  
    2. Essential Math for AI and Data Science Course  
    3. Introduction to AI Course  
    4. Applied Machine Learning Course  
    5. Introduction to Computer Vision using Python Course  
    6. Practical Natural Language Processing Course  
If you are an AI newbie, you should start from course 1 to 6 in the following order.  
Otherwise, you can select a preferred one based on your background knowledge.  
If you want to enquire about other classes, just type the specific name of the track.  
If you want to know about jump start program and other services offered for IT enthusiasts, type `jump start and services`.    
SGenerally, IT learners who have already completed at least three Simbolo courses are allowed to join jump start programs.

patterns: classes, tracks for Data Analysis, DS?
responses:
For Simbolo's Data Science Track/classes,  
  1.Fundamentals of Python Programming Course  
   2.Essential Math for Ai and Data Science Course  
   3.Power Bi Course  
  4.Oracle Database Foundation Course  
    5.Introduction to Artificial Intelligence Course  
    6.Applied Machine Learning Course  
    7.Data Science Foundation Course  
if you are a beginner, highly recommended to start from 1 to 7.  
For more information for each class, type class's names.  
If you want to know about jump start internship program and other offers for students, type `jump start and offers`.

**𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝘁𝗼 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝘂𝘁𝗲𝗿 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 (𝗕𝗮𝘁𝗰𝗵 𝟭𝟬)**  
  
Computer Vision (CV) is a technology that uses algorithms to understand objects  
in digital images, similar to human vision. It's used for object detection, radiology,  
transportation, media, marketing, and architecture, and is widely used in  
healthcare, radiology, and other fields.  
  
Class Details  
Start Date - January 6, 2023   
Time - 4:00 PM to 5:30 PM( Sat & Sun )   
Duration - 2 months  
Course Fee - 80000 MMK (40000 MMK per month)  
Teaching Platform - Zoom (Live Section)  
prerequisites - Must have basic of Python and Machine Learning  
instructor info - Tr.Cynthia  
  
Outline  
- Introduction to Computer Vision  
- Image Processing with Python  
- Machine Learning with Python  
- Deep Learning with Python  
  
If you want to attend the class, you can fill out the form below and register for the  
course.  
https://forms.gle/scaqfpvZ76SYBz4c7

**Practical Natural Language Processing class**  
  
The Practical Natural Language Processing class at Símbolo aims to teach the basics of Generation Models, including Text, Audio, and Video Generation, and their applications in the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP). The course covers various concepts and theories of NLP, with readings provided every other day. Completing the course will equip students with the knowledge to apply NLP in various projects and ensure their continued learning.  
  
Course detail for Batch 1  
Start Date -  
Time -   
Duration -  
Course Fee -   
Teaching Platform -   
prerequisites - Must have basic of Python and Machine Learning  
Instructor - Tr. Yi Yi Can Myae Win Sein  
  
Course outline  
- Machine Learning and NLP  
- Text Normalization and Regular Expression  
- Word Representation  
- N-gram Language Models  
- Linear Classification and Generalization  
- Part-of-Speech Tagging  
- Dependency Parsing  
- Neural Networks and Backpropagation  
- RNN, GRU, LSTM  
- Attention and Machine Translation  
- Transformer, BERT

Símbolo is a training school that teaches science and technology subjects such as Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Web Development, Mobile Development and Information Technology with quality courses not only theoretically but also practically in a project-based manner. In addition, we aim to continue education during this difficult time.  
Símbolo is pronounced in Spanish and means Symbol. Símbolo was founded on May 6, 2021. Simbolo's office has now opened in Mandalay.

there are many special opportunities that only Símbolo's students can get.  
**Membership Card**  
  
Students who have attended at least three (3) classes in Símbolo's open classes will receive a membership card that will allow them to attend additional classes with a 5% discount.  
Membership Card can be accessed from the link below  
[Membership Card: 5%  Discounts](https://forms.gle/tRuPEtB1dPK8SyAw5)  
  
**Jump Start Internship Program**  
  
Have attended 5 classes in Símbolo's (AI + Data Science) Track or (Web + Mobile) Track, Jump Start Internship Program is organized for those who have obtained at least 3 certificates.  
  
Jump Start Internship Program details can be accessed from the link below.  
https://m.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=794493319128951&id=100057048716138&mibextid=Nif5oz  
**Super Paid Project Opportunities**  
 Upon completion of the Jump Start Program  
For Paid Projects, there is also a Súper Program that will give priority to students who have completed the Jump Start Program.  
  
**Letter of Recommendation**  
  
For those who have attended 3rd grade in Símbolo's classes, either to apply for a scholarship or not. There is a chance to get an important letter of recommendation for other programs as well.  
Letter of Recommendation by Academic Department (https://shorturl.at/KPY01)  
  
**Competition Mentorship**  
  
Students who want to actively represent Símbolo in various AI and IT competitions will be given the necessary guidance in the competition.  
(Contact +959942457901  if you need any support for national and international competitions)  
 **Pocket Money Program for Symbols**  
  
The Pocket Money Program can be joined by students who have attended at least 1 class of Símbolo and team members working with Símbolo.
In addition to teaching IT and AI courses from Símbolo, Símbolo Servicio, a brand sub-brand of Símbolo, also provides services related to graphics.
For those who want to participate in the Pocket Money Program, your friends, You can introduce your friends about Símbolo's courses and graphics services and participate.  
Pocket Money Program details can be accessed from the link below.  
 https://shorturl.at/quPQ5  
  
**Student Clubs**  
  
As a student attending Símbolo, you can gather with friends who share your interests and do activities at the Student Club.
